member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.TileEffect
member.summary: Repeats the specified region of an image.

remarks.p: This effect generates a logically infinite sized image. To create a smaller tiled region, feed its output through the .
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Tile effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.TileEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TileEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.TileEffect.SourceRectangle
member.summary: The region of the image to be tiled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.TileEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Tile effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.
